value:
Today's weather is quite lovely. I
do not care for direct sunlight, but
spring is...pleasant.

Nohr, where I come from, has four
seasons, of course. But the climate
is never quite this nice...$k$pI just want to sit under a tree and
study a tactical manual.

Are you fatigued? I have some chilled
tomato juice. Let us share it in the
shade of that tree.

It's about time for lunch, isn't it?
I made this. Be sure to savor it.

Wait, I bid you! I must divide the food
into equal portions.$k$pThere. Eat as much as you like.

I am Leo, prince of Nohr. I know
you must be busy, so I've brought
you some lunch.

I'm in top form. It must be thanks
to that delicious tomato sandwich
I had for lunch.

Unsatisfactory. Perhaps the
tomatoes weren't quite ripe...

I was up so late cooking that I didn't
get enough sleep. That must be it...

Tremendous. I'll use this newfound
strength to pore over recipe books
and uncover more delicious cuisine.

I am Leo, prince of Nohr. Today is
a rare chance to rest, so let's not
get too rowdy, hmm?

What's your most enjoyable memory,
$Nu?$k$pYou might be surprised to hear that
today may well be one of mine.$k$pI've had so few chances to simply
relax with my friends and family, you
see...$k$pSeeing everyone gobble up the food
I made put a smile on my face.$k$pI'd be happy to cook for you again.
So please, eat as much as you like.
さあ
行くよ
うああっ！
なんだよっ…！
Try a bite of this!
Just a taste.
Shame on you.
Excuse yourself!
Time...for a nap...
Haha
I'm not used to this much sunlight. It's...ngh...blinding.
Why are you being so sneaky? This is a picnic!
I'm told my cooking has a certain refreshing flavor.
How does it taste? It must delicious, given I made it myself.
What about this? I had my retainers prepare it for us.
Last time I was able picnic was...too long ago.
You want...to try some of my cooking? If you insist...
Noted.
Let the picnic begin!
Mmm!
